Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common

Class OptionalMethods

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.OptionalMethods
public class OptionalMethods
extends Object
Methods for working with java.util.Optional objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static <T,​ U extends T>
    U    		 contentsOf​(Optional<T> optional)
    Returns the contents of the provided Optional, narrowed to the type of the receiving variable, or null if the Optional is empty.
    static <T,​ U extends T>
    Optional<U>    		 narrow​(Optional<T> optional)
    Narrows the contents of the provided Optional to an instance of U and returns it within a new Optional.
    static <T,​ U extends T>
    Optional<T>    		 widen​(Optional<U> optional)
    Widens the type of the provided optional.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • contentsOf

      public static <T,​ U extends T> U contentsOf​(Optional<T> optional)
      Returns the contents of the provided Optional, narrowed to the type of the receiving variable, or null if the Optional is empty. 
       Optional<CharSequence> opt = Optional.of("Hello");
 //String s1 = opt.get(); *** Does not compile ***
 String s2 = OptionalMethods.contentsOf(opt);
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object within the Optional (a superclass or interface)
      U - The return type (a subclass or implementation)
      Parameters:
      optional - The Optional whose contents is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The narrowed contents of the Optional

    • narrow

      public static <T,​ U extends T> Optional<U> narrow​(Optional<T> optional)
      Narrows the contents of the provided Optional to an instance of U and returns it within a new Optional. Only use this method if you know that what's inside the Optional is an instance of T or you risk getting a ClassCastException at runtime. 
       // OK
 Optional<Object> opt1 = Optional.of("Hello");
 Optional<String> opt2 = Optionals.narrow(opt1);

 // Bad
 Optional<Object> opt1 = Optional.of(Integer.MAX_VALUE);
 Optional<String> opt2 = OptionalMethods.narrow(opt1); // Compiles. String is a subclass of Object
 opt2.get().charAt(0); // ClassCastException! Integer is not a subclass of String
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object in the provided Optional (a superclass or interface)
      U - The type of the object in the returned Optional (a subclass or implementation)
      Parameters:
      optional - An Optional whose contents is to be narrowed
      Returns:
      A new Optional with narrow-casted contents or the same Optional if it was empty.

    • widen

      public static <T,​ U extends T> Optional<T> widen​(Optional<U> optional)
      Widens the type of the provided optional. This method simply returns the specified Optional, but circumvents the compilation error caused by brute force casting: 
       Optional<String> opt1 = Optional.of("Hello");
 // Does not compile:
 // Optional<Object> opt2 = (Optional<Object>) opt1;
 Optional<Object> opt2 = OptionalMethods.widen(opt1);
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object in the returned Optional
      U - The type of the object in the specified Optional
      Parameters:
      optional - The Optional to be widened
      Returns:
      An Optional with a widened type
